page.title: 18A CHILD'S LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7.00am .l am dressed in my uniform and have eaten my breakfast by 7.30am and leave for school. I catch a bus to Northwood Hills and walk from the bus stop to school. I arrive at 8.00am. At 8.45am the bell signals the start of school. A register is taken before the four lessons that take place before break. Food is eaten at break. two lessons take place before lunch break that ends at 2.15pm. After lunch two more lessons take place before leaving. I catch the bus home and arrive at 4.15pm. On a Saturday I do my paper round. When I get back I make breakfast for everyone as they are still asleep. I watch Breakfast TV or TV AM, which include news, weather and celebrity interviews. Later I play for Northwood Football Club,have lunch and then shop and have dinner.
